pullRequest.title: [PaxosStateLog] File to Sqlite Integration Tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):
Add integration tests to make sure we don't get surprised by some implementation detail
Implementation Description (bullets):
Straightforward, extracted some methods to a common utils class
Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):
The PR is tests
Concerns (what feedback would you like?):
Anything else we want to test?
Where should we start reviewing?:
small
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday):
Today?

commit.message: Remove unused code and fix checkstyle
Exit early if nothing to migrate
Add file to sqlite migration tests
Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into psl/intergation-test

nodes.bodyText: not actionable: it's ok that this explodes if null is returned (since this is a test and we don't want nulls)
